Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital: Case 38-2010: a 13-year-old 
girl with an enlarging neck mass.

Cabot RC(1), Harris NL, Shepard JA, Rosenberg ES, Cort AM, Ebeling SH, Peters 
CC, Misra M, Parangi S, Ross DS, Shailam R, Sadow PM.

Author information:
(1)Pediatric Service, Massachusetts General Hospital, USA.
